thread.title: Great budget hotel in a quiet central location
thread.title_full: Great budget hotel in a quiet central location - Review of Lidos Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: KateBrighton
title: Great budget hotel in a quiet central location
text:
Couldn't fault it for the price. Clean quiet room, polite friendly staff and a decent breakfast too.
Ok the room is very small, and there is no air-con (which means no hums which to us is a real bonus) but the bed was comfy, the shower worked well, no annoying street noise, the reception personnel were helpful and the ambience was pleasant.
Our new best-find hotel- more pleasant than the ubiquitous cheaper chains - and really well-placed as we could walk to Piccadilly or the South Bank in 30 mins.
